aegis.name: Aegis
aegis.description: If foe is 2 spaces from unit, reduces damage from foe's attack by 50%.

aether.name: Aether
aether.description: Treats foe's Def/Res as if reduced by 50% during combat.Restores HP = half of damage dealt.

blackluna.name: Black Luna
blackluna.description: Treats foe's Def/Res as if reduced by 80% during combat.(Skill cannot be inherited.)

blazingflame.name: Blazing Flame
blazingflame.description: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in an area near target take damage equal to 1.5 x (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

blazinglight.name: Blazing Light
blazinglight.description: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in an area near target take damage equal to 1.5 x (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

blazingthunder.name: Blazing Thunder
blazingthunder.description: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in an area near target take damage equal to 1.5 x (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

blazingwind.name: Blazing Wind
blazingwind.description: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in an area near target take damage equal to 1.5 x (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

blueflame.name: Blue Flame
blueflame.description: Boosts damage by 10. If unit is adjacent to an ally, boosts damage by 25 instead.

bonfire.name: Bonfire
bonfire.description: Boosts damage by 50% of unit's Def.

buckler.name: Buckler
buckler.description: Reduces damage from an adjacent foe's attack by 30%.

chillingwind.name: Chilling Wind
chillingwind.description: Boosts damage by 50% of unit's Res.

draconicaura.name: Draconic Aura
draconicaura.description: Boosts damage by 30% of unit's Atk.

dragonfang.name: Dragon Fang
dragonfang.description: Boosts damage by 50% of unit's Atk.

dragongaze.name: Dragon Gaze
dragongaze.description: Boosts damage by 30% of unit's Atk.

earthfirebalm.name: Earthfire Balm
earthfirebalm.description: When healing an ally with a staff, grants Atk/Def+4 to all allies for 1 turn.

earthfirebalm+.name: Earthfire Balm+
earthfirebalm+.description: When healing an ally with a staff, grants Atk/Def+6 to all allies for 1 turn.

earthwaterbalm.name: Earthwater Balm
earthwaterbalm.description: When healing an ally with a staff, grants Def/Res+4 to all allies for 1 turn.

earthwaterbalm+.name: Earthwater Balm+
earthwaterbalm+.description: When healing an ally with a staff, grants Def/Res+6 to all allies for 1 turn.

escutcheon.name: Escutcheon
escutcheon.description: Reduces damage from an adjacent foe's attack by 30%.

fireemblem.name: Fire Emblem
fireemblem.description: Boosts damage by 30% of unit's Spd.Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit and all allies for 1 turn after combat. (Bonus granted to allies even if unit's HP reaches 0.)

firefloodbalm.name: Fireflood Balm
firefloodbalm.description: When healing an ally with a staff, grants Atk/Res+4 to all allies for 1 turn.

firefloodbalm+.name: Fireflood Balm+
firefloodbalm+.description: When healing an ally with a staff, grants Atk/Res+6 to all allies for 1 turn.

galeforce.name: Galeforce
galeforce.description: If unit initiates combat, grants unit another action after combat.(Once per turn.)

glacies.name: Glacies
glacies.description: Boosts damage by 80% of unit's Res.

glowingember.name: Glowing Ember
glowingember.description: Boosts damage by 50% of unit's Def.

growingflame.name: Growing Flame
growingflame.description: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in a wide area around target take damage equal to (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

growinglight.name: Growing Light
growinglight.description: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in a wide area around target take damage equal to (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

growingthunder.name: Growing Thunder
growingthunder.description: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in a wide area around target take damage equal to (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

growingwind.name: Growing Wind
growingwind.description: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in a wide area around target take damage equal to (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

heavenlylight.name: Heavenly Light
heavenlylight.description: When healing an ally with a staff, restores 10 HP to all allies.

hero'sblood.name: Hero's Blood
hero'sblood.description: Boosts damage by 30% of unit's Spd.Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit and all allies for 1 turn after combat. (Bonus granted to allies even if unit's HP reaches 0.)

holyvestments.name: Holy Vestments
holyvestments.description: If foe is 2 spaces from unit, reduces damage from foe's attack by 30%.

icemirror.name: Ice Mirror
icemirror.description: If foe is 2 spaces from unit, reduces damage from foe's attacks by 30%. Boosts unit's next attack by total damage reduced (by any source, including other skills) when Special triggers. Resets at end of combat. (Skill cannot be inherited.)

iceberg.name: Iceberg
iceberg.description: Boosts damage by 50% of unit's Res.

ignis.name: Ignis
ignis.description: Boosts damage by 80% of unit's Def.

imbue.name: Imbue
imbue.description: When healing an ally with a staff, restores an additional 10 HP to target ally.

imperialastra.name: Imperial Astra
imperialastra.description: Boosts damage by 40% of unit's Spd.

kindled-firebalm.name: Kindled-Fire Balm
kindled-firebalm.description: When healing an ally with a staff, grants Atk+4 to all allies for 1 turn.

luna.name: Luna
luna.description: Treats foe's Def/Res as if reduced by 50% during combat.

lunarflash.name: Lunar Flash
lunarflash.description: Treats foe’s Def/Res as if reduced by 20% during combat. Boosts damage by 20% of unit's Spd.

mayhemaether.name: Mayhem Aether
mayhemaether.description: During combat, treats foe's Def/Res as if reduced by 50%. Restores HP = 50% of damage dealt.

miracle.name: Miracle
miracle.description: If unit's HP > 1 and foe would reduce unit's HP to 0, unit survives with 1 HP.

moonbow.name: Moonbow
moonbow.description: Treats foe's Def/Res as if reduced by 30% during combat.

newmoon.name: New Moon
newmoon.description: Treats foe's Def/Res as if reduced by 30% during combat.

nj\u00f6run'szeal.name: Njörun's Zeal
nj\u00f6run'szeal.description: If unit initiates combat, grants another action to unit after combat. (Once per turn.) When Special triggers, inflicts "restricts movement to 1 space" on unit and Pair Up cohort through their next action.

openthefuture.name: Open the Future
openthefuture.description: Boosts damage by 50% of unit's Def. Restores HP = 25% of damage dealt.

pavise.name: Pavise
pavise.description: Reduces damage from an adjacent foe's attack by 50%.

radiantaether.name: Radiant Aether
radiantaether.description: During combat, treats foe's Def/Res as if reduced by 50%. Restores HP = 50% of damage dealt.

regnalastra.name: Regnal Astra
regnalastra.description: Boosts damage by 40% of unit's Spd.(Skill cannot be inherited.)

reprisal.name: Reprisal
reprisal.description: Boosts damage by 30% of damage dealt to unit.

retribution.name: Retribution
retribution.description: Boosts damage by 30% of damage dealt to unit.

righteouswind.name: Righteous Wind
righteouswind.description: Boosts damage by 30% of unit's Spd. Restores 10 HP to unit and all allies after combat. (Healing does not stack if triggered more than once per combat. HP restored to allies even if unit's HP reaches 0.)

risingflame.name: Rising Flame
risingflame.description: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in an area near target take damage equal to (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

risinglight.name: Rising Light
risinglight.description: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in an area near target take damage equal to (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

risingthunder.name: Rising Thunder
risingthunder.description: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in an area near target take damage equal to (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

risingwind.name: Rising Wind
risingwind.description: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in an area near target take damage equal to (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

rupturedsky.name: Ruptured Sky
rupturedsky.description: Boosts damage by 20% of foe's Atk. If in combat against a dragon foe or beast foe, boosts damage by 40% instead of 20%.

sacredcowl.name: Sacred Cowl
sacredcowl.description: If foe is 2 spaces from unit, reduces damage from foe's attack by 30%.

sirius.name: Sirius
sirius.description: Boosts damage by 30% of unit's Spd. Restores HP = 30% of damage dealt.

solid-earthbalm.name: Solid-Earth Balm
solid-earthbalm.description: When healing an ally with a staff, grants Def+4 to all allies for 1 turn.

still-waterbalm.name: Still-Water Balm
still-waterbalm.description: When healing an ally with a staff, grants Res+4 to all allies for 1 turn.

swift-windsbalm.name: Swift-Winds Balm
swift-windsbalm.description: When healing an ally with a staff, grants Spd+4 to all allies for 1 turn.

twinblades.name: Twin Blades
twinblades.description: Boosts damage by 40% of unit's Res. Disables non-Special skills that "reduce damage by X%."

umbrablast.name: Umbra Blast
umbrablast.description: After combat, deals 5 damage to target and foes within 2 spaces of target and then unit and target foe swap spaces.

umbracalamity.name: Umbra Calamity
umbracalamity.description: After combat, deals 15 damage to target and foes within 2 spaces of target and then unit and target foe swap spaces.

umbraeruption.name: Umbra Eruption
umbraeruption.description: After combat, deals 10 damage to target and foes within 2 spaces of target and then unit and target foe swap spaces.

vengeance.name: Vengeance
vengeance.description: Boosts damage by 50% of damage dealt to unit.

windfirebalm.name: Windfire Balm
windfirebalm.description: When healing an ally with a staff, grants Atk/Spd+4 to all allies for 1 turn.

windfirebalm+.name: Windfire Balm+
windfirebalm+.description: When healing an ally with a staff, grants Atk/Spd+6 to all allies for 1 turn.
